messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

confluence access thursday pm rights confluence hello please give pricing both confluence thanks senior engineer

message.reasoning:

It seems to lean heavily towards "Access" given the keywords. I'll need to make sure none of the other options provide a better fit.
